thread.title: Top 10 New Year's Eve Parties in Vancouver, BC
thread.title_full: Top 10 New Year's Eve Parties in Vancouver, BC

title: Top 10 New Year's Eve Parties in Vancouver, BC
text:
Top 10 New Year's Eve Parties in Vancouver, BC 19+ Vancouver New Year's Eve Parties By Dana Lynch Updated December 11, 2016 . 
Vancouver's Top 10 New Year's Celebrations & Parties have something for everyone, from the elegant and intimate to the raunchy and over-the-top. 
This year, it's all happening Saturday, December 31, 2016 ! 
continue reading below our video 5 Tips to Make Coach Feel Like First Class Dinner cruise from Spirit Cruises. Image Courtesy of Spirit Cruises 3. Fairmont Waterfront New Years Eve 2017 - 25+ 
Ring in the New Year with breathtaking views at this waterfront gala, including views of the NYE Vancouver's (see below) midnight fireworks display at Canada Place. There are also two rooms of dancing, complimentary "appetizer stations" and champagne toast, and a "massive" balloon drop. Dress "chic and sassy" (jackets for the men). Must be 25 or older. Tickets : $65 - $140 More Â» 4. NYE Extravaganza Club Crawl 2017 - 19+ 
Don't want to stay in one spot all night? This NYE club crawl is aimed at students and includes the famous Roxy Nightclub, one of Vancouver's hottest nightclubs . Tickets include front-of-the-line admission to three more clubs, plus party favours and transportation between events (so no waiting in the cold!)
